Name: Patrick's Group
description:
Patrick, pictured above, has six children and is always described as a very hardworking individual, which is why he was selected to become the group leader of his group. Patrick is representing his group of nine farmers in Teso district, and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Patrick has been a farmer for more than 20 years and, in order to earn enough to feed his family, he decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season.

His loan will not only include farming inputs, but also a solar light, which he is very happy to be getting as that means he will now have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study.

With the profits from this coming season, Patrick is planning to send his children to school.

A total of seven acres will be planted by Patrick's Group, and between them they will receive a total of three solar lights.
